$ul: **actions**: A set of changes made as part of this action (more details)
**confirmed**: Flag describing whether the action should be previewed before executing or not
**id**: ID of the action batch. Can be used to check the status of the action batch at /organizations/{organizationId}/actionBatches/{actionBatchId}
**organizationId**: ID of the organization this action batch belongs to
**completed**: Flag describing whether all actions in the action batch have completed
**createdResources**: Resources created as a result of this action batch
**errors**: List of errors encountered when running actions in the action batch
**failed**: Flag describing whether any actions in the action batch failed
**synchronous**: Flag describing whether actions should run synchronously or asynchronously
